product_name: NYX Professional MakeupPro Fix Stick Color Correcting Concealers
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackCorrect, conceal, & brighten in a swipe with Pro Fix Stick Color Correcting Concealers from NYX Professional Makeup available in 24 shades!
details: DetailsBenefitsThe quickest way to fix it all! Dark circles? Fixed! Blemishes? Fixed! Discoloration? Fixed! Redness? Fixed!Pro fix sticks to conceal, correct, and brighten in a quickie.Creamy stick formula infused with hyaluronic acid for the smoothest glide ever!Never dry & never draggy.Available in 24 pro shades with a buildable medium-coverage & a natural skin-like finish.It's a quick fix that last! Transfer-resistant formula that last up to 12h wear.Pro tip: layer this comfortable & breathable formula flawlessly under and over foundation. Its a quick fix!Key IngredientsMade with Hyaluronic Acid to moisturize while you wear!Item 2617411How To UseMaster the color correcting techniques that have dominated your for you page! Get your fix on with a wide range of shades for all needs and skin tones.0.1 Green: neutralizes redness on light to medium skin tones.0.2 Pink: brightens and conceals discoloration on fair to medium skin tones.0.3 Yellow: brightens and conceals discoloration on fair to light skin tones.0.4 Dark Peach: brightens and conceals discoloration on medium to deep skin tones.0.5 Apricot: conceals hyperpigmentation and offsets dark areas on deep skin tones.0.6 Brick Red: corrects deep discoloration on rich deep skin tones.Fix dullness, redness, blemishes, dark spots, undereye circles, and discoloration for all skin tones and all skin types! After color correcting, layer on the complexion shades as needed to conceal & brighten. These comfortable 12 hour wear complexion shades layer flawlessly under and over foundation for a full-face fix!IngredientsIsodecyl Neopentanoate, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Synthetic Wax, Isononyl Isononanoate, Octyldodecanol, Paraffin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline, Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Lecithin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Carbonate, Isostearic Acid, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol
how_to_use: Master the color correcting techniques that have dominated your for you page! Get your fix on with a wide range of shades for all needs and skin tones.0.1 Green: neutralizes redness on light to medium skin tones.0.2 Pink: brightens and conceals discoloration on fair to medium skin tones.0.3 Yellow: brightens and conceals discoloration on fair to light skin tones.0.4 Dark Peach: brightens and conceals discoloration on medium to deep skin tones.0.5 Apricot: conceals hyperpigmentation and offsets dark areas on deep skin tones.0.6 Brick Red: corrects deep discoloration on rich deep skin tones.Fix dullness, redness, blemishes, dark spots, undereye circles, and discoloration for all skin tones and all skin types! After color correcting, layer on the complexion shades as needed to conceal & brighten. These comfortable 12 hour wear complexion shades layer flawlessly under and over foundation for a full-face fix!
ingredients: Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline
Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Effective, but difficult to layer
reviews.comments: The green hue reduces the look of redness, but is very thick and makes layering under foundation difficult. there is a slight green tinge to the makeup.

reviews.headline: I will purchase again
reviews.comments: Very smooth will buy again for sure

reviews.headline: Secret Weapon
reviews.comments: I am super pale with pink undertones and thought I'd try this - and I've now re-purchased it twice! It's brightening and covers nicely without being heavy

reviews.headline: Way too Blue-ish
reviews.comments: This green corrector pulled way too blue on my fair, pink undertone skin. I also felt the formula itself was a bit too drying on my skin. I have dry, rosacea/acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: Too drying for me
reviews.comments: Made my under eyes dry and look older.

reviews.headline: Cheap Quality
reviews.comments: It is a good corrector however, the stick breaks easily. Its hard to use now since it broke off.

reviews.headline: Love this as a Redhead
reviews.comments: Perfect for my skin in texture and tone, so happy with the pink color corrector!

reviews.headline: separates like crazy!
reviews.comments: i couldnt get the peach shade to work for me. maybe my under eyes are too dry but i also tried using it to spot conceal scars and it separated every time and wouldnt blend!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I ordered green and my concealer color. One day, I added only the green to my darker areas of redness. I found that it did not blend well at all. I do have a lot of red and red-undertones. Personally a tinted moisturizer with neutral undertones works better for me. Next day, I tried the concealer color. It worked a little better but left my face feeling cakey. Hopefully, they work better for you.

reviews.headline: My favorite concealer
reviews.comments: I have been using this for a long time now, it works wonderfully for under my eyes! I use the pink color, in the summer im tan and in the winter I am fair. I love that its creamy! Looks great with the natural makeup looks as well as a dolled up full face look. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Looking for a Cheap Corrector/Concealer? Keep looking.
reviews.comments: my skin type is normal to oily with most of the oil comkng from my T-Zone. I got the peach corrector and a shade of a concealer tone, and not even 5 minutes pass and i look like dandrruff is coming out of my pores.

reviews.headline: Looking for a Cheap Corrector/Concealer? Keep looking.
reviews.comments: my skin type is normal to oily with most of the oil comkng from my T-Zone. I got the peach corrector and a shade of a concealer tone, and not even 5 minutes pass and i look like dandrruff is coming out of my pores.

reviews.headline: Looking for a Cheap Corrector/Concealer? Keep looking.
reviews.comments: my skin type is normal to oily with most of the oil comkng from my T-Zone. I got the peach corrector and a shade of a concealer tone, and not even 5 minutes pass and i look like dandrruff is coming out of my pores.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Works very well with NYX glaze skin tint! Not so well with some of my other products. Very creamy and full coverage.

reviews.headline: Second purchasing
reviews.comments: I got this one just to try a different color correction concealer it is amazing I already purchased second one, can't stop using it. Super light weight, full coverage excellent for dry under eyes!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Amazing. The pink shade is great for pale skin.

reviews.headline: Undereye Game Changer
reviews.comments: The peach color corrector works wonders for my contant eye bags. Glides on smooth and blends out beautifully.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again. I use it alone like eyeshado.
reviews.comments: This is great alone on lids as a primer or shadow.

reviews.headline: would reccomend!
reviews.comments: ideal if you want something with light coverage

reviews.headline: love this concealer it's my go to now
reviews.comments: buttery and soft it is so brightning and comfortable to wear. under powder and make up looks great and honestly changes my whole looks and hides my eye bags. it's a must have and my new fav.

media.headline: Dry and settles into every crack and line
An incredible magic concealer for mature under eye
media.caption: I'm 52 by the way...1 & 2 are with fair & peach, 3 with peach & 4 no makeup

faceoff_positive.comments: This is an incredible color corrector/concealer in one for mature thin skin around the eyes!  I have such a problem finding a product that doesn't weigh heavy under my eyes really settling into the very fine lines I have due to the creepy skin I have from a lot of fat loss in my face and aging of course.  I picked this up in peach first and it worked great for the slight bluish tone I had under my eyes.  I have very fair neutral combination skin with lines around my eyes and lips.  I lost my teeth due to a muscular degenerative disease so I've got a lot of lines around my lips but I can use a tiny detail brush with the fair shade & lightly touch up those areas and the lines disappear!  These have been my new little secret and I'm so thankful!  Every woman is entitled to feel their very best & when they find those products that fit into their confidence booster "Holy Grail" kit that makes them feel their best self that's when you know you're making a product that is magic!
faceoff_positive.headline: An incredible magic concealer for mature under eye

faceoff_negative.comments:
For reference I tried the correctors apricot and brick red with the shade sienna.

At first I did NOT like these products! I used the smash box primer and it felt like these concealers were not blending at ALL! Just stirring around on my face and it looked CRAZY (I didn't upload a picture because it looked fine on camera but crazy in person) so I tried it again lol

I was going for a makeup no makeup "clean girl" look as you can see in the pictures and I liked it better! I used the milk hydrogrip primer but it was still‚Ä¶ehh. It's not something I would reach for.

It was hard to blend with a brush. So I guess overall, use a hydrating non-silicone based primer (so none of those pore blurring primers) and use a hydrating spray to mix it. I can't tell you how long it lasts because I haven't worn it for too long but if I do wear it again, I will update this review.

Apricot ‚Äî it's said it's too correct hyperpigmentation and I believe it to be accurate. It covered my acne scars perfectly. But I must say it doesn't look bad as a normal shade either. I feel like it doubles as a corrector and a regular concealer.

Brick red ‚Äî it's for discoloration but I feel like this is TOO red for my neutral undertones and skin tone. It made the sienna concealer look red. This may be better suited for deeper/darker skin tones and those with more warm undertones.

Sienna ‚Äî I love to use concealers as my foundation so to speak and this shade match is a perfect highlighting concealer, not an all over concealer for me. This is what made it ehh and made me realize it depends what primer you use because with the milk hydrogrip it was HARD to blend this out. You could slightly see the tribal marks in person üò≠ but it isn't a bad concealer however I do not have time to figure which primer works best for this hence why I gave it a 3.
faceoff_negative.headline: Primer matters!

rollup.name: Pro Fix Stick Color Correcting Concealers
